topic.title: GIVE BACK THE LEGISLATION TO THE PEOPLE FROM THE POLITICAN ELITE USING DECENTRALISED TECHNOLOGY!
topic.body:
With decentralized open source technologies. Where webpages are stored on users' computers, making the page's source code transparent to everyone. The page is not stored on a manipulable central server. We should build a system where we would bring and vote for the laws, without for the hands of politicians. Maintaining the system would be inexpensive. Modify and vote laws. Identify people on the basis of their knowledge and ideas. All this is a handful  without this parasite elite!
.
.

#Why would this be need?

.
.

Because we live in a illusion of democracy. The media is entirely controlled by an elite layer. The politicans and the media are entirely under their control! What they do is totally against the people and humanity. They decide who can people vote.After the parliamentary elections, the political elite will bring the laws to their liking. Those who would really like to do it for the community can't do it! This state is untenable, the technology is given and it is time to move as soon as possible.

.
.

#What to do?

.
.

#Spread the idea!

Call a referendum on the subject. Technological developments in this direction by programmers. Broadly disseminating the idea on the Internet in Facebook, YouTube, and great social media! Until the idea goes to TV. Support the program from the state budget.

topic.title: Chemistry And Pyrotechnics a professional help for people who make their own fireworks
topic.body:
Chemistry And Pyrotechnics a professional help for people who make their own fireworks

The world's first services for amateur pyrotechnics to talk openly about the subject. And they don't have to fear being censored because they talk, or share something too openly about the subject.

The websites:

[Chemistry And Pyrotechnics Zite Index](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JArw6Qb7cG6NuZBqvBSprURr2aaZdCFq9)

Make your own pyrotechnics, chemistry, ZeroNet site and index here. Or you can join using a existing community. All zites in 0Net are 100% open source, censor resistant. 

Multilanguage forum, more than 20 language. Decentralized video and file sharing service. Self made blogs and sites. People who make their own fireworks here they find all the help they need for their work. Third party devoid services, where the right to freedom of expression is respected for amateur pyrotechnics and chemists. The pages are controlled and hosted by the global amateur pyro community, people like you, without outside influence.

Available languages: English, Deutsch, Chinese, Russian, Persian, Hungarian, Polski, Spanish, Norsk, Svenska, Nederlands, Slovenija, Czech, Romania, Slovakia, Serbia, Hrvatski, Bengali, Arabic, Hindi, Vietnamese, Indonesian, Dansk, French, Italiano, Portuguese, Ukrainian, Korean, Japanese,

1522102434_195Xafx3aZsxtngKo7D3XWgByQ5rY.body:
About similar projects.None of them works perfectly.

-Tor onion sites: Absolute the clearnet setup tourgh the TOR network with low bandwidht.

-Steemit,Dtube: After 1 week your can not delete or edit your files.Earning money for 1 week.Later your videos crash and there is a non-functioning player on the site.Using the IPFS system,realy its not decentralised.

-Bitchute: Using web torrent and its realy not decentralised.

-Freenet: His abilities are very limited.The system is badly worked out.(practically useless)

-I2P: Closed network,same as TOR with limited funktions.Without outproxies.The TOR software, weak imitation.

-Safenet: One unusable useless experimental project.The protocol what the system use is interesting.

-Substratum: A guy talking and show us nothing.Another joke marketing without any results.

-And ZeroNet: Slowly growing.Already reached a level,that it is worth to deal with it,and not just experimenting good.But nothing guarantees non-stop availability of the sites.And the ZeroNet file transmission tourgh P2P system compared to Torrent programs works buggy.But if you look a realy decentralised clearnet alternative,with bandwidth and annonymity.The best choice.Currently experimenting,and it is border also suitable for more serious use.

> [deafboy](#comment_55_1xf9XC4Nsa7YfQWFiK6xGsNDJA3AaCTUa): Beaker browser is pretty cool. It can speak http, dat and ipfs.

The problem loot of people are can not install and setup programs like ZeroNet.If browser developpers integrate the decentralisated protocols in the browser (and they can seed the sites).Projects what include the integration will be popular.If the Zites can find the google search egnie and open the browser it will be a big breakthrough.Another way was a proxy server like TOR doo it.But this way the clearnet users never seed the zites.And this make problems.The popular programs will win this race and another will gone.The solution is a unified platform.No one can use countless platforms.One of the biggest is the Firefox,the Tor browser was firefox based.And the biggest anonymous network was TOR.In the long term, a common protocol will be the solution.The ZeroNet developpers can integrate a plugin in browser too what start the program when ZeroNet Start.And can add the program the Firefox and Tor browser too.

https://www.theinquirer.net/inquirer/news/3025478/firefox-59-will-support-decentralised-internet-protocols

> [james007](#comment_177_1DiRWRFXcVgQQ75cXnAG2pyxxjGo2VaH5): Don't forget FOTA/SESTA and the CLOUD Act passed. That means snoops can seize your data no matter where it is stored, and they don't need a warrant. Additionally, content publishers are held responsible for comments users make. If everyone used ZeroNet, they couldn't arrest everyone world wide over controversial comments... if only more people cared to use it, and if only people didn't elect worthless politicians that enact such tyranny.

In TOR always mode its true.But they can connect to the site and track down the current users.Like a they doo with torrents (See Germany).Another thing your share your services from your PC.If you goes a HotSpot its not possible in a short time to share files and own sites.

It is not mandatory to use the page.You are paying with this for the content.When you close the page the mining will stop too.For those who are this is not good, they are looking for another page.In return for the minnig, you get quality content.There are not too many options to monetize to your zites.

1572732591_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body:
Bitchute are a video sharing platform, ZeroNet a platform for share some sites. With only video sharing from an IT point of view far away Bitchute wins. In terms of freedom of expression ZeroNet wins.

Bitchute: The users can access all video files 24/7. And no unseeded dead files. When the server shooted down all video files are dead. Maybe some ISPs are banned but the are TOR. The server store all files 24/7 without user interraction. Google and clearnet search egnies are index the video files.

ZeroNet: We have lot of dead links.  Many video files are not played. The zites when have seeder are censor resistance. Users need to install a extra software to access the files. Some ISPs banned ZeroNet too. The user store the file, without seeders the file are offline. If the user goes offline forewer, the file link are exit forewer, but the file will be never online again. Users must wait the files, and some files are newer be downloaded. But the most the censor resistence platform.

If I want to watch a movie or video, i'm using the clearnet. Videos are directly available and with high bandwidth. For a year i seed the C&P video share all files, and almost nothing online on it when i'm goes offline. So it's free from censorship, but nobody cares because nothing can be directly accessible from it. I'm seeding another zites large files too, the same. And there is also the torrent with much more stable, simple downloading mechanism, and users, +DHT.
